sentences.en: A good company pension scheme remains a potent weapon for attracting staff.
sentences.cn: 良好的公司养老金计划依然是吸引员工的有效武器。

sentences.en: Advertising is a potent force in showing smoking as a socially acceptable habit.
sentences.cn: 广告的力量很大，把吸烟说成为社会所接受的习惯。

sentences.en: Alcohol is a potent drug that anaesthetizes the brain.
sentences.cn: 酒精是一种能麻醉大脑的烈性药物。
但正是那一点点东西有着非凡的意义!

sentences.en: Epinephrine is one of the most potent vasopressor drugs known.
sentences.cn: 肾上腺素是已知最强的升压药之一.

sentences.en: He was once a potent ruler.
sentences.cn: 他曾经是有权势的统治者.
她的感情之强简直是超乎寻常!

sentences.en: Here he touches a recognition deeper than fear, more potent than nightmare.
sentences.cn: 这里,他所涉及的认识比恐怖深沉, 比梦魇更强烈.

sentences.en: Many of the new therapies also happen to be incredibly potent.
sentences.cn: 还有许多新的治疗方法具有令人难以置信的潜力.

sentences.en: Mr. Adams produced his potent argument at the meeting.
sentences.cn: 亚当斯先生在会上提出了有说服力的论点.

sentences.en: Some antigens, or combinations of antigens, are much more potent than others.
sentences.cn: 某些抗原或者联合抗原可比其它抗原作用强得多.

sentences.en: The drug is extremely potent, but causes unpleasant side effects.
sentences.cn: 这种药药效极强，但会产生不良的副作用。

sentences.en: The medicine had a potent effect on your disease.
sentences.cn: 这药物对你的病疗效很大.

sentences.en: The medicine is potent enough to produce the desired effect.
The pre - emptive technology is the potent combination of computers.
sentences.cn: 计算机与电信的有效结合形成了空前未有的技术优势.

sentences.en: Their most potent weapon was the Exocet missile.
sentences.cn: 飞鱼导弹是他们最有攻击力的武器。

words.tran_cn: 有说服力地；强有力地；有效力地
统治者，君主；有权势的人

trans.tran_cn: 有效的，强有力的，有权势的，烈性的，有说服力的
trans.tran_en: having a very powerful effect or influence on your body or mind
